title: Trigger an alert in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on the 'Trigger Alert' button
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Trigger Alert' button, activate the button to trigger the alert.

instructions: With focus on the 'Trigger Alert' button, activate the button to trigger the alert.
